document_data.caption: Conch shell
document_data.name: Conch
document_data.mainbody: '''Conch''' shell was a generic name for a number of different varieties of [[sea snail]] shell. A large specimen in good condition had a base value of 10 [[gp]].
document_data.Notable Conches:
* ''[[Horn of the tritons]]'', a variety of [[enchanted]] conch used by [[triton]]s.
* ''[[Conch of teleportation|Conches of teleportation]]'' were large conch shells inscribed with the ''[[Giant dictionary#U|uvar]]'' rune that could [[teleport]] the user to a pre-defined location.
